source.query:
select to_char(now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'garak' as market
FROM cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_intermediary
union
select 
to_char(now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'yanggok' as market
FROM cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_intermediary
order by date;

update cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_intermediary 
set 
mi_p = trim(COALESCE(mi_p,''))
,ma_p=trim(COALESCE(ma_p,''))
,av_p=trim(COALESCE(av_p,''))
,pav_p=trim(COALESCE(pav_p,''))
,fluc = trim(COALESCE(fluc,''))
,d_mark = trim(COALESCE(d_mark,''))
,j_7 = trim(COALESCE(j_7,''))
,j_7_mark = trim(COALESCE(j_7_mark,''))
,market = trim(COALESCE(market,''))
where date = to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day', 'YYYYMMDD')
;
select 1 as success
;

(select to_char( now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'1' as p_pos_gubun
,'2' as s_pum_nm
FROM cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_wholesalemarket
union
select 
to_char( now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'3' as p_pos_gubun
,'2' as s_pum_nm
FROM cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_wholesalemarket
)
union 
 (select to_char( now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'1' as p_pos_gubun
,'3' as s_pum_nm
FROM cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_wholesalemarket
union
select 
to_char( now(),'YYYYMMDD') as date
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '1 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p
,to_char(now() - INTERVAL '7 day','YYYYMMDD') as date_p7
,'3' as p_pos_gubun
,'3' as s_pum_nm
FROM cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_wholesalemarket
)
order by date;

update cd_ods.tb_garak_pricebyitemgrade_wholesalemarket
set 
mi_p = trim(COALESCE (mi_p,''))
,ma_p=trim(COALESCE (ma_p,''))
,av_p=trim(COALESCE (av_p,''))
,fluc = trim(COALESCE (fluc,''))
,d_mark_p=trim(COALESCE (d_mark_p,''))
,d_mark_r=trim(COALESCE (d_mark_r,''))
,j_same_p=trim(COALESCE (j_same_p,''))
,j_same_r=trim(COALESCE (j_same_r,''))
,j_same_mark_p=trim(COALESCE (j_same_mark_p,''))
,j_same_mark_r=trim(COALESCE (j_same_mark_r,''))
WHERE date = to_char(now()- INTERVAL '1 day', 'YYYYMMDD') 
;
select 1;

preCopyScript.value:
delete
    from  cd_ods.tb_asos_weather_day
   where tm between '@{pipeline().parameters.StartYM}'
               and '@{pipeline().parameters.EndYM}'

source.query:
WITH v_seq AS 
 (
 	select   generate_series( '2021', '2021', 1  ) AS num 
 )
 select  to_char(to_date('0','yyyy') + interval '1 year' * v_seq.num,'yyyy') as year      
FROM v_seq

SELECT YEAR, adm_cd , '1' AS low_search
FROM cd_ods.tb_sgis_stats_population_t
WHERE length(adm_cd) = 2
UNION ALL
SELECT YEAR, adm_cd , '2' AS low_search
FROM cd_ods.tb_sgis_stats_population_t
WHERE length(adm_cd) = 2

WITH v_seq AS 
 (
 	select   generate_series( '2021', '2021', 1  ) AS num 
 )
 select  to_char(to_date('0','yyyy') + interval '1 year' * v_seq.num,'yyyy') as year      
FROM v_seq

SELECT YEAR, adm_cd , '1' AS low_search
FROM cd_ods.tb_sgis_stats_searchpopulation_t
WHERE length(adm_cd) = 2

SELECT YEAR, adm_cd , '1' AS low_search
FROM cd_ods.tb_sgis_stats_searchpopulation_t
WHERE length(adm_cd) = 5

query.value:
select srd_id
    ,sd_reviewid
    ,site
    ,site_id
    ,srd_title
    ,srd_content
    ,srd_writer
    ,srd_writetime
    ,srd_rate
    ,srd_crawl_time
      from  cd_ods.tb_rsn_market_full 
     where rnum between 1 + ( 1000000 * ( @{item().page} -1 ) )  and 1000000 * @{item().page}

activities.name: Merge Data
